hotels.title: Stylish Manchester City Escape in the Trendy Northern Quarter
hotels.description: Discover the Northern Quarter’s dazzling spread of bohemian bars, quirky cafés and the tremendous live music scene with a stay at the Crowne Plaza Manchester City Centre, an IHG Hotel. The city’s rich industrial history is celebrated throughout the hotel’s modern design and onsite amenities, making for a memorable stay. Make use of the round-the-clock business centre and gym or fuel your appetite at the Glasshouse Restaurant and Bar, serving bistro-style classics, cocktails and charming high tea.

hotels.title: Convenient Manchester Airport Stay with Onsite Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Whether it's for business or pleasure, experience the epitome of convenience and relaxation at the Crowne Plaza Manchester Airport, an IHG Hotel. A complimentary airport shuttle will do the heavy lifting for you, and the onsite restaurant will help streamline your stay. This plush haven is a stone's throw from Manchester's vibrant city centre. From the historic Castlefield to the bustling Northern Quarter, this hotel is the perfect gateway to discover Manchester's unique charms.

hotels.title: Heritage Manchester Urban Escape Minutes from the Northern Quarter
hotels.description: Showcasing stunning Victorian architecture, the Kimpton Clocktower Hotel, an IHG Hotel amalgamates heritage and modern design for a stylish stay. Work up a sweat at the onsite fitness centre, savour fine dining options at The Refuge Dining Room, or take in a spot of afternoon tea at the Winter Garden. Of course, you can also venture out into the heart of Manchester to hunt for a hearty meal, or explore the bohemian Northern Quarter a short walk away.

hotels.title: Heritage Manchester City Break Near Bohemian Northern Quarter
hotels.description: Discover Victorian-era splendour with signature North England verve at Hotel Indigo Manchester - Victoria Station, an IHG Hotel. Positioned just a minute’s walk from Manchester Victoria train station at the gateway to the city’s bohemian Northern Quarter, this red-bricked historic tea warehouse turned boutique hotel is the perfect place to discover Manchester’s best. If you want to stay in, head to the Mamucium Restaurant & Bar for locally-sourced British fare, classic cocktails and quirky industrial-chic decor.

hotels.title: Five-Star Manchester Luxury with Contemporary Japanese & Mexican Restaurant
hotels.description: Discover five-star luxury in the heart of Manchester at The Edwardian Manchester, a stunning lifestyle destination that has recently undergone a multi-million-pound redesign, introducing a new standard of service with spacious rooms, stunning suites featuring sweeping city views and meeting spaces for up to 500 people. When you're not exploring this vibrant city, stay close to home and enjoy award-winning contemporary Japanese and Mexican cuisine at Peter Street Kitchen, or opt for Champagne afternoon tea at The Library Champagne Bar.
